structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: No water supplier who discontinues water service pursuant to an order from the sewer body as provided in KRS 96.930 to 96.943, shall incur any liability by reason thereof, except to the extent of its own negligence or other improper conduct.
law.history: Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 8, effective June 19, 1958.
